## Inventory Update Request

Complete the following steps to request and Inventory Update

1.  Go to the [Inventory Github page](https://github.com/Kourtney-Burger/Inventree) and click on the 'Issues' tab

    ![](images/Screenshot%202023-01-03%20163007.png){width="573"}

2.  Click the green 'New Issue' button and select the appropriate Issue Template

    ![](images/Screenshot%202023-01-03%20163229.png){width="144"}

    ![](images/Screenshot%202023-01-03%20163501.png){width="569"}

3.  Follow the directions in the issue template, and click the 'Submit new issue' button to submit the inventory update request form

    ![](images/Screenshot%202023-01-03%20163615.png)

Email Kourtney Burger (kourtney.burger\@noaa.gov) with any inventory related questions
